item.title: 拉加德敦促欧洲为共同优先事项汇集资源
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，随着欧洲生产率增长乏力，世界分裂为相互竞争的集团，欧洲应在国防和气候等领域集中资源。【原文：Europe should pool its resources in areas like defense and climate as its productivity growth falters and the world fragments into rival blocs, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: Sam Altman 加入旧金山新市长过渡团队
item.description: 旧金山当选市长丹尼尔-卢里（Daniel Lurie）组建了一个过渡团队，其中包括 OpenAI 的联合创始人萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman），在这位政治新贵执掌旧金山官僚机构之际，利用当地有影响力的领导人。【原文：San Francisco Mayor-elect Daniel Lurie assembled a transition team that includes OpenAI co-founder Sam Altman, leveraging influential local leaders as the political newcomer takes the reins of the city’s bureaucracy.】

item.title: 纽约交通局批准 9 美元的拥堵收费标准
item.description: 大都会交通管理局批准了曼哈顿交通拥堵收费修订计划，而当选总统唐纳德-特朗普曾威胁说，一旦他上任，将终止该计划。【原文：The Metropolitan Transportation Authority approved a revised congestion pricing plan for Manhattan that President-elect Donald Trump has threatened to terminate once he takes office.】

item.title: 加密资产大涨，纳斯达克准备上市现货比特币 ETF 期权
item.description: 纳斯达克公司正计划上市贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Nasdaq Inc. is planning to list options on BlackRock Inc.’s Bitcoin exchange-traded fund, possibly as soon as Tuesday, allowing investors to use derivatives to bet on or against the world’s largest digital asset.】

item.title: 高盛认为美元在新关税制度下将 "长期走强
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The dollar is entering a new period of strength fueled by Donald Trump’s plans to impose steep tariffs, currency strategists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. say.】

item.title: 部长称，卡里巴大坝水位暴跌后，赞比亚和津巴布韦面临警醒
item.description: 世界上最大的人造水库水位骤降，导致赞比亚和津巴布韦停电数小时，一位高级官员说，这说明为什么它们需要实现能源来源多样化。【原文：A plunge in water levels at the world’s largest man-made reservoir, which has left Zambia and Zimbabwe without power for hours, shows why they need to diversify their energy sources, according to a top official.】

item.title: 庞巴迪英国贿赂案调查终结，美国联邦调查局（SFO）退让给美国和加拿大
item.description: 英国严重欺诈办公室结束了对庞巴迪公司贿赂和腐败指控的调查，而美国和加拿大的类似调查则暂缓进行。【原文：The UK’s Serious Fraud Office closed its investigation into bribery and corruption allegations at Bombardier Inc., deferring to comparable probes in the US and Canada.】

item.title: 巴西进口阿根廷天然气计划取得进展
item.description: 巴西正在推进从阿根廷瓦卡穆埃尔塔气层进口天然气的计划，这表明双边商业交易可以克服复杂的政治关系。【原文：Brazil is moving forward with plans to import natural gas from Argentina’s Vaca Muerta formation in a sign that bilateral business deals can overcome a complicated political relationship.】

item.title: 刺激经济和特朗普关税引发交易员出逃，中国 ETF 现金大量流失
item.description: 由于对中国经济增长前景的担忧加剧，以及唐纳德-特朗普政府可能征收新关税，购买中国股票的交易所交易基金继续出现资金外流。【原文：Exchange-traded funds that buy Chinese stocks continue to see outflows amid rising concerns over the nation’s growth outlook and the risk of new tariffs under a Donald Trump administration.】

item.title: 国家性别平等办公室的正确做法
item.description:
削减的理由

【原文：

The case for cuts

】

item.title: 洛杉矶布鲁克菲尔德银行大厦评估价值下降 69
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）的一家附属公司拥有的洛杉矶市中心一座塔楼的价值被削减了 69%，这是美国中央商务区写字楼遭遇困境的最新迹象。【原文：The value of a downtown Los Angeles tower owned by an affiliate of Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. was slashed 69%, the latest sign of troubles for offices in US central business districts.】

item.title: 凯雷认为 2025 年美国首次公开募股情况将稳步改善，但不急于求成
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：There will be a steady increase in the number of initial public offerings in the US through 2025, albeit no “switch will be flipped” for companies to rush to list, according to a top executive at Carlyle Group Inc.】

item.title: 如何抓住骗取医疗保险数十亿美元的欺诈者
item.description:
给政府效率部上的一课

【原文：

A lesson for the Department of Government Efficiency

】

item.title: 众议院道德小组将在压力下召开会议，公布马特-盖茨的调查结果
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，众议院道德委员会计划于周三召开闭门会议，因为它面临着公布对当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的美国司法部长人选、前众议员马特-盖茨（Matt Gaetz）性行为不端指控的调查结果的要求。【原文：The House Ethics Committee plans to meet behind closed doors Wednesday as it faces demands to release its findings on sexual misconduct allegations against former Representative Matt Gaetz, President-elect Donald Trump’s nominee to be US Attorney General, according to people familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚国内生产总值落后于预期，石油和矿业产出萎缩
item.description: 由于采矿业和制造业产出萎缩，哥伦比亚第三季度的经济表现落后于预期，这支持了总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）关于需要更大幅度降息的论点。【原文：Colombia’s economy lagged expectations in the third quarter as mining and manufacturing output contracted, bolstering President Gustavo Petro’s argument that deeper interest rate cuts are needed.】

item.title: 空气化工产品公司在与激进分子交锋前更新董事会成员
item.description: 空气化工产品公司（Air Products and Chemicals Inc.【原文：Air Products and Chemicals Inc. named two new board members ahead of its shareholder meeting in a potentially defensive move against pressure from two activist investors.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金将不动产与股票部门合并
item.description: 挪威 1.7 万亿美元的财富基金将从今年 1 月起把实物资产业务领域与股票业务领域合并，以加强对两类资产的管理。【原文：Norway’s $1.7 trillion wealth fund is merging its real assets business area with equities from January to strengthen the management of both asset classes.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示：拒绝率上升，信贷更难获得
item.description: 今年，美国消费者在获得信贷方面遇到了更大的困难，汽车贷款和抵押贷款再融资申请被拒的比例达到了十多年来的最高水平。【原文：US consumers had a tougher time accessing credit this year, with applications for auto loans and mortgage refinancing being turned down at the highest rates in more than a decade.】

item.title: Silver Point 完成 85 亿美元的私人信贷基金
item.description: 银点资本（Silver Point Capital）表示，它已完成了一项85亿美元的直接借贷基金，该基金将专注于为中型企业提供贷款，这距离它完成一项46亿美元的信贷基金仅过去了两个月。【原文：Silver Point Capital said it’s closed a $8.5 billion direct lending fund that will focus on providing loans to mid-sized companies, just two months after closing a $4.6 billion credit fund.】

item.title: 新日铁誓言反进口以赢得美国钢铁工人的支持
item.description: 新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp. ）向美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. is promising unionized workers of United States Steel Corp. that it won’t send steel shipments from its overseas mills as part of its commitments to seal a $14.1 billion takeover of the iconic American company.】

item.title: 受经济增长前景影响，30 年期债券收益率升至 5 月以来最高点
item.description: 周一，随着投资者继续消化唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统大选可能对经济和美联储政策产生的影响，国债跌势加剧，长期国债收益率创下近六个月来的新高。【原文：The Treasuries selloff deepened Monday sending long-term bond yields to the highest in almost six months as investors continue to digest how Donald Trump’s victory of the presidential election may affect the economy and the Federal Reserve’s policy.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚航空公司认为货币暴跌 50%影响 "不大
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚航空集团（Ethiopian Airlines Group）表示，受国际航线收入的影响，今年该国货币暴跌 50%以上，该集团仅受到轻微冲击。【原文：Ethiopian Airlines Group said it took only a minor hit from a more than 50% plunge in the country’s currency this year, shielded by income from its international routes.】

item.title: 阿布扎比的 IRH 探索投资 Alphamin 的刚果锡矿
item.description: 阿布扎比国际资源控股公司（International Resources Holding）正在洽谈收购全球最大锡生产商之一的间接股份。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s International Resources Holding is in talks about buying an indirect stake in one of the world’s biggest tin producers.】

item.title: 皮尤称，美国年轻人依赖社交媒体影响者获取新闻。
item.description:
皮尤研究发现，40% 的年轻人在没有接受过正规新闻培训的情况下依赖于社交媒体影响者

。【原文：

Pew Research found 40% of young adults rely on social media influencers without formal journalism training

】

item.title: 大选后美国住宅建筑商情绪创七个月新高
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商的信心在 11 月份升至七个月来的最高点，原因是销售预期跃升，以及对特朗普政府将减轻监管负担持乐观态度。【原文：Confidence among US homebuilders advanced to a seven-month high in November on a jump in sales expectations and optimism a Trump administration will ease regulatory burdens.】

item.title: 魁北克 CDPQ 公司押注量化策略，并渴望做得更多
item.description: 魁北克公共养老基金管理公司在不到四年的时间里将其量化股票团队的资产规模扩大到 140 多亿美元，该公司的一位高管还希望做得更大。【原文：Quebec’s public pension fund manager has grown its quantitative equity team to more than $14 billion of assets in less than four years, and one of its top executives is bullish on doing even more.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利下调巴西股票评级，财政风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）将巴西股票评级下调至 "减持"（underweight），并警告说，该国不断膨胀的财政赤字可能会压垮央行控制通胀的努力，从而迫使利率上升。【原文：Morgan Stanley downgraded Brazilian stocks to underweight, warning that the country’s burgeoning fiscal deficit may overwhelm central bank attempts to control inflation, forcing interest rates higher.】

item.title: Meta 因 2021 年全球数据泄露事件在德国法院败诉
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司因 2021 年全球 5 亿人的私人数据泄露事件在最高法院败诉，面临着数千名德国用户索赔的风险。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. risks being on the hook for compensation claims from thousands of German users after it lost a top court ruling over the 2021 global leak of half a billion people’s private data.】

item.title: 高盛准备分拆数字资产平台计划
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）正与潜在合作伙伴洽谈，计划将其数字资产平台分拆成一家新公司，供大型金融公司通过区块链技术创建、交易和结算金融工具。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc is speaking with potential partners as it plans to spin out its digital-assets platform into a new company for large financial firms to create, trade and settle financial instruments via blockchain technology.】

item.title: 德国电力因寒冷天气展望跃升至一年来最高水平
item.description: 由于预计气温骤降和可再生能源产量下降，德国电力价格升至一年多来的最高点。【原文：German power prices rose to their highest in more than a year on a forecast for plunging temperatures and a drop in renewable energy output.】
